about_the_game:
Potions Icon Set is an RPG Maker official collection of icons made in pixel art.
With "Potions Icon Set", you have access to 50 high-quality pixel art potion sprites inspired by potions and items from fantasy RPG worlds; it contains potions and items designed for many different purposes. They are most suitable as icons for menus, but can be used as item drops or whatever you desire to use them for.

■Highly detailed and vibrant potion sprites hand-drawn in pixel art from the size of 16x16px then upscaled pixel-perfect to 32x32px to give the feel of classic pixel art video games.

■Includes health/mana/stamina potions, varying potions for elemental defenses or other effects, empty jars or bottles, antidotes, poisons, and many more!

■Use as icons for menus, item drops from enemies, props for scenes, or whatever you can think of!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------


【Icon Set (1 Sheet)】

Includes:
1.) potions-icons.png
2.) IconSet.png
3.) “individual-sprites” folder containing the 50 potion icons in their individual images.

【TileSet (1 sheet)】
item-drop-potion_E.png

With "Potions Icon Set", you have access to 50 high-quality pixel art potion sprites inspired by potions and items from fantasy RPG worlds; it contains potions and items designed for many different purposes. They are most suitable as icons for menus, but can be used as item drops or whatever you desire to use them for.

■Highly detailed and vibrant potion sprites hand-drawn in pixel art from the size of 16x16px then upscaled pixel-perfect to 32x32px to give the feel of classic pixel art video games.

■Includes health/mana/stamina potions, varying potions for elemental defenses or other effects, empty jars or bottles, antidotes, poisons, and many more!
